Package it.polimi.ingsw.clients

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.clients.ClientController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientControllerCli, GuiController
public abstract class ClientController extends Object
Implements the common functionalities of the cli/gui controllers.

    abstract void
    showServerUnreachableMessage()
     
    void
    startCheckingIfServerIsUp()
    The client periodically checks if it has received a beat from the server If, when the client checks, the last beat from the server was received too much time ago, the client considers the server down and disconnects
    void
    startSendingBeatsToServer()
    Launches a thread that sends beats to the server periodically When the server receives a beat from the client it means the client is still alive If the server doesn't receive a beat from the client it considers the client down
    void
    stopPeriodicTasks()
     
    void

    • startSendingBeatsToServer

      public void startSendingBeatsToServer()
      Launches a thread that sends beats to the server periodically When the server receives a beat from the client it means the client is still alive If the server doesn't receive a beat from the client it considers the client down

    • startCheckingIfServerIsUp

      public void startCheckingIfServerIsUp()
      The client periodically checks if it has received a beat from the server If, when the client checks, the last beat from the server was received too much time ago, the client considers the server down and disconnects
